trans-unit.source: Function Provider
trans-unit.target: 函式提供者

trans-unit.source: Function Provider
trans-unit.target: 函式提供者

trans-unit.source: PROVIDER NAME
trans-unit.target: 提供者名稱

trans-unit.source: Function
trans-unit.target: 函式

trans-unit.source: DRIVES
trans-unit.target: 磁碟機

trans-unit.source: Function:
trans-unit.target: Function:

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 簡短描述

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the functions defined in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 提供 Windows PowerShell 中定義之函式的存取。

trans-unit.source: DETAILED DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 詳細描述

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell Function provider lets you get, add, change, clear, and delete the functions and filters in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 函式提供者可讓您取得、新增、變更、清除和刪除 Windows PowerShell 中的函式和篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: A function is a named block of code that performs an action.
trans-unit.target: 函式是可執行動作的具名程式碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: When you type the function name, the code in the function runs.
trans-unit.target: 當您輸入函式名稱時，函式中的程式碼就會執行。

trans-unit.source: A filter is a named block of code that establishes conditions for an action.
trans-unit.target: 篩選條件是可建立執行動作條件的具名程式碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: You can type the name of the filter in place of the condition, such as in a [Where\-Object [m2]](assetId:///f4c69467-d5ce-4da2-87d5-d2ae74be8acb) command.
trans-unit.target: 您可以輸入的名稱來取代條件，篩選例如在 [其中\-物件 #91; m2 ]](assetId:///f4c69467-d5ce-4da2-87d5-d2ae74be8acb) 命令。

trans-unit.source: In the Function: drive, functions are preceded by the label "Function" and filters are preceded by the label "Filter", but they operate properly when used in the correct context regardless of the label.
trans-unit.target: 在 Function: 磁碟機中，函式前面會加上 "Function" 的標籤，而篩選條件前面則會加上 "Filter" 的標籤，但不論標籤為何，在正確的內容中使用它們時仍能正確運作。

trans-unit.source: The Function provider is a flat namespace that contains only the function and filter objects.
trans-unit.target: 函式提供者是只包含函式和篩選條件物件的一般命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Neither functions nor filters have child items.
trans-unit.target: 函式和篩選條件都沒有子項目。

trans-unit.source: Each function is an instance of the System.Management.Automation.FunctionInfo class.
trans-unit.target: 每個函式都是 System.Management.Automation.FunctionInfo 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Each filter is an instance of the System.Management.Automation.FilterInfo class.
trans-unit.target: 每個篩選條件都是 System.Management.Automation.FilterInfo 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The examples in this section show how to manage functions, but the same methods can be used with filters.
trans-unit.target: 本節的範例會示範如何管理函式，但是相同的方法可以搭配篩選條件使用。

trans-unit.source: The Function provider exposes its data store in the Function: drive.
trans-unit.target: 函式提供者會在 Function: 磁碟機中公開它的資料存放區。

trans-unit.source: To work with functions, you can change your location to the Function: drive \("set\-location function:"\).
trans-unit.target: 若要使用函式，您可以變更您的位置函式︰ 磁碟機 \(」 設定\-位置函式: 「\)。

trans-unit.source: Or, you can work from another Windows PowerShell drive.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以從其他 Windows PowerShell 磁碟機參照。

trans-unit.source: To reference a function from another location, use the drive name \(Function:\) in the path.
trans-unit.target: 若要從其他位置參照函式，使用 [磁碟機名稱 \(函式︰\) 路徑中。

trans-unit.source: The Function provider supports all of the cmdlets whose names contain the Item noun \(the Item cmdlets\), except for [Invoke\-Item [m2]](assetId:///38a9887b-ce1a-4bde-be4e-98012efae204).
trans-unit.target: 函式提供者支援的所有名稱包含 Item 名詞的 cmdlet \(Item cmdlet\), ，除了 [Invoke\-項目 #91; m2 ]](assetId:///38a9887b-ce1a-4bde-be4e-98012efae204)。

trans-unit.source: And, it supports the [Get\-Content [m2]](assetId:///86d8b4af-af2c-4a27-9519-2c9fd420be3d) and [Set\-Content [m2]](assetId:///6fff9b86-86df-4440-b7b7-8124b22088fc) cmdlets.
However, it does not support the cmdlets whose names contain the ItemProperty noun \(the ItemProperty cmdlets\), and it does not support the Filter parameter in any cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不過，不支援名稱包含 ItemProperty 名詞的 cmdlet \(ItemProperty cmdlet\), ，而且它不支援任何 cmdlet 中 Filter 參數。

trans-unit.source: All changes to the functions affect the current console only.
trans-unit.target: 對函式所做的所有變更只會影響目前的主控台。

trans-unit.source: To save the changes, add the function to the Windows PowerShell profile, or use [Export\-Console [m2]](assetId:///0858eece-ddcb-4525-89d1-4732c5f54c48) to save the current console.
trans-unit.target: 若要儲存所做的變更，將函式加入至 Windows PowerShell 設定檔，或使用 [匯出\-主控台 #91; m2 ]](assetId:///0858eece-ddcb-4525-89d1-4732c5f54c48) 來儲存目前的主控台。

trans-unit.source: CAPABILITIES
trans-unit.target: 功能

trans-unit.source: ShouldProcess
trans-unit.target: ShouldProcess

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Getting to the Function: Drive
trans-unit.target: 連到 Function︰ 磁碟機

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 1
trans-unit.target: 範例 1

trans-unit.source: Changes the current location to the Function: drive.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的位置變更為 Function: 磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: You can use this command from any drive in Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從 Windows PowerShell 中的任何磁碟機使用此命令。

trans-unit.source: To return to a file system drive, type the drive name.
trans-unit.target: 若要返回檔案系統磁碟機，請輸入磁碟機名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, type "set\-location c:".
trans-unit.target: 例如，輸入 「 設定\-位置 c:"。

trans-unit.source: Getting Functions
trans-unit.target: 取得函式

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 1
trans-unit.target: 範例 1

trans-unit.source: This command gets the list of all the functions in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會取得目前工作階段中的所有函式清單。

trans-unit.source: You can use this command from any Windows PowerShell drive.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從任何 Windows PowerShell 磁碟機使用此命令。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 2
trans-unit.target: 範例 2

trans-unit.source: This command gets the "man" function from the Function: drive.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從 Function: 磁碟機取得 "man" 函式。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Get\-Item cmdlet to get the function.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 Get\-項目 cmdlet 來取得函式。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator \(|\) sends the result to Format\-Table.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 \(|\) 將結果傳送給格式\-資料表。

trans-unit.source: The Wrap parameter directs text that does not fit on the line onto the next line.
trans-unit.target: Wrap 參數會指示將一行放不下的文字放至下一行。

trans-unit.source: The Autosize parameter resizes the table columns to accommodate the text.
trans-unit.target: Autosize 參數會調整表格欄大小來容納文字。

trans-unit.source: If you are in a different drive, add the drive name \(Function:\) to the path.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在不同的磁碟機中，新增的磁碟機名稱 \(函式︰\) 的路徑。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 3
trans-unit.target: 範例 3

trans-unit.source: These commands both get the function named "c:".
trans-unit.target: 這兩個命令都會取得名為 "c:" 的函式。

trans-unit.source: The first command can be used in any drive.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令適用於任何磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: The second command is used in the Function: drive.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令適用於 Function: 磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: Because the name ends in a colon, which is the syntax for a drive, you must qualify the path with the drive name.
trans-unit.target: 由於名稱結尾是冒號 (此為磁碟機的語法)，因此，您必須使用磁碟機名稱來限定路徑。

trans-unit.source: Within the Function: drive, you can use either format.
trans-unit.target: 在 Function: 磁碟機中，您可以使用任一種格式。

trans-unit.source: In the second command, the dot \(.
trans-unit.target: 在第二個命令中，點 \(。

trans-unit.source: represents the current location.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: Creating a Function
trans-unit.target: 建立函式

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 1
trans-unit.target: 範例 1

trans-unit.source: This command uses the New\-Item cmdlet to create a function called "HKLM:".
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 [新增\-項目 cmdlet 來建立函式呼叫"HKLM:"。

trans-unit.source: The expression in braces is the script block that is represented by the function name.
trans-unit.target: 使用括號括起來的運算式是函式名稱所代表的指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a function by typing it at the Windows PowerShell command line.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以在 Windows PowerShell 命令列中輸入函式來建立它。

trans-unit.source: For example, tpe "function:hklm: {set\-location hklm:}".
trans-unit.target: 例如，輸入 「 函式︰ hklm: {設定\-位置 hklm:}"。

trans-unit.source: If you are in the Function: drive, you can omit the drive name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在 Function: 磁碟機中，就可以省略磁碟機名稱。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot specify the "Filter" label in New\-Item, filters are labeled as functions, but they operate properly with any label.
trans-unit.target: 因為您無法在新增指定"Filter"標籤\-項目，篩選條件標示為函式，但它們與任何標籤一起正常運作。

trans-unit.source: To create a filter with the "Filter" label, type the filter at the command line.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立含有 "Filter" 標籤的篩選條件，請在命令列中輸入篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: For example, type "filter:Running {$\_.Status \-eq "Running"}".
trans-unit.target: 例如，輸入"filter: Running {$\_。狀態 \-eq"Running"}"。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 2
trans-unit.target: 範例 2

trans-unit.source: This command uses the New\-Item cmdlet to create a function called Csrss.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 [新增\-項目 cmdlet 來建立名為 Csrss 的函式。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Options dynamic parameter to specify a value of ReadOnly for the Options property of the function.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 Options 動態參數，為函式的 Options 屬性指定 ReadOnly 的值。

trans-unit.source: This command works from any location.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令可從任何位置運作。

trans-unit.source: If you are in the Function: drive, you can use a dot \(.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是在 Function︰ 磁碟機中，您可以使用點 \(。

trans-unit.source: to specify the path.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The dot represents the current location.
trans-unit.target: 點代表目前的位置。

trans-unit.source: Deleting a Function
trans-unit.target: 刪除函式

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 1
trans-unit.target: 範例 1

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the "hklm:" function from the current session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從目前的工作階段刪除 "hklm:" 函式。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 2
trans-unit.target: 範例 2

trans-unit.source: This command deletes all the functions from the current session except for the functions whose Options property has a value of Constant.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會從目前的工作階段刪除所有函式，但 Options 屬性值為 Constant 的函式除外。

trans-unit.source: Without the Force parameter, the command does not delete functions whose Options property has a value of ReadOnly.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有 Force 參數，命令就不會刪除 Options 屬性值為 ReadOnly 的函式。

trans-unit.source: When you delete all the functions, the command prompt changes because the prompt function, which defines the content of the command prompt, is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 當您刪除所有函式時，因為已刪除定義命令提示字元內容的提示函式，所以命令提示字元也會變更。

trans-unit.source: Displaying the Properties and Methods of Functions
trans-unit.target: 顯示函式的屬性和方法

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 1
trans-unit.target: 範例 1

trans-unit.source: This command uses the Get\-Item cmdlet to get all the functions.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 Get\-項目 cmdlet 來取得所有函式。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator sends the results to the Get\-Member cmdlet, which displays the methods and the properties of the object.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子將結果傳送至\-成員指令程式，以顯示方法和物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you pipe a collection of objects \(such as the collection of functions in the Function: drive\) to Get\-Member, Get\-Member evaluates each object in the collection separately and returns information about each object type that it finds.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用管線傳送物件的集合 \(例如函式中的函式的集合︰ 磁碟機\) 取得\-成員，取得\-成員會個別評估集合中的每個物件並傳回每個找到的物件類型的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: If all of the objects are of the same type, it returns information about the single object type.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有的物件都具有相同類型，則會傳回單一物件類型的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: In this case, all of the functions are FunctionInfo objects.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，所有函式都是 FunctionInfo 物件。

trans-unit.source: To get information about the collection of FunctionInfo objects, use the InputObject parameter of Get\-Member.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得 FunctionInfo 物件集合的相關資訊，請使用 InputObject 參數的 Get\-成員。

trans-unit.source: For example, type "get\-member \-InputObject \(get\-item function:\*\)".
trans-unit.target: 例如，輸入 「 取得\-成員 \-InputObject \(取得\-函式項目︰\*\)」。

trans-unit.source: When you use the InputObject parameter, Get\-Member evaluates the collection, not the objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 InputObject 參數，取得\-成員會評估集合，集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 2
trans-unit.target: 範例 2

trans-unit.source: This command lists the values of the properties of the "prompt" function.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會列出 "prompt" 函式的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Get\-Item cmdlet to get an object that represents the "prompt" function.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 Get\-項目 cmdlet 來取得代表"prompt"函式的物件。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator \(|\) sends the results to the Format\-List command.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 \(|\) 將結果傳送至格式\-List 命令。

trans-unit.source: The Format\-List command uses the Property parameter with a wildcard character \(\*\) to format and to display the values of all of the properties of the "prompt" function.
trans-unit.target: 格式\-List 命令使用 Property 參數搭配萬用字元 \(\*\) 來格式化和顯示所有的"prompt"函式的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Changing the Properties of a Function
trans-unit.target: 變更函式的屬性

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 1
trans-unit.target: 範例 1

trans-unit.source: You can use the Set\-Item cmdlet with the Options dynamic parameter to change the value of the Options property of a function.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用組\-項目 cmdlet 搭配 Options 動態參數來變更函式的 Options 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This command sets the AllScope and ReadOnly options for the "prompt" function.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令會為 "prompt" 函式設定 AllScope 和 ReadOnly 選項。

trans-unit.source: This command uses the Options dynamic parameter of the Set\-Item cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 Options 動態參數集的\-項目指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The Options parameter is available in Set\-Item only when you use it with the Alias or Function provider.
trans-unit.target: 選項參數是集中\-項目只在使用 Alias 或 Function 提供者時。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 2
trans-unit.target: 範例 2

trans-unit.source: This command uses the Set\-Item cmdlet to change the "prompt" function so that it displays the time before the path.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用集\-項目 cmdlet 來變更"prompt"函式，以便它會顯示路徑之前的時間。

trans-unit.source: The change affects both the Definition and ScriptBlock properties of the FunctionInfo object.
trans-unit.target: 變更會影響 FunctionInfo 物件的 Definition 和 ScriptBlock 屬性。

trans-unit.source: To see the effect of the change, type "get\-item \-path function:prompt | format\-list \-property \*".
trans-unit.target: 若要查看變更的效果，請輸入"取得\-項目 \-路徑函式︰ prompt |格式\-清單 \-屬性 \*」。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 3
trans-unit.target: 範例 3

trans-unit.source: This command uses the Rename\-Item cmdlet to change the name of the "help" function to "gh".
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用重新命名\-"help"函式的名稱變更為"gh"的項目指令程式。

trans-unit.source: Copying a Function
trans-unit.target: 複製函式

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLE 1
trans-unit.target: 範例 1

trans-unit.source: This command copies the "prompt" function to "oldPrompt", effectively creating a new name for the script block that is associated with the prompt function.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會將 "prompt" 函式複製到 "oldPrompt"，有效地為與提示函式相關聯的指令碼區塊建立新名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can use this to save the original prompt function if you plan to change it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更它，就可以使用此命令來儲存原始提示函式。

trans-unit.source: The Options property of the new function has a value of None.
trans-unit.target: 新函式的 Options 屬性值為 None。

trans-unit.source: To change the value of the Options property, use Set\-Item.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更 Options 屬性值，請使用集\-項目。

trans-unit.source: DYNAMIC PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 動態參數

trans-unit.source: Dynamic parameters are cmdlet parameters that are added by a Windows PowerShell provider and are available only when the cmdlet is being used in the provider\-enabled drive.
trans-unit.target: 動態參數是只提供者中使用此指令程式時，由 Windows PowerShell 提供者，並且可用於所加入的指令程式參數\-啟用磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: Options \<System.Management.Automation.ScopedItemOptions
trans-unit.target: 選項 \<System.Management.Automation.ScopedItemOptions

trans-unit.source: Determines the value of the Options property of a function.
trans-unit.target: 判斷函式的 Options 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: No options.
trans-unit.target: 沒有選項。

trans-unit.source: "None" is the default.
trans-unit.target: "None" 為預設值。

trans-unit.source: Constant
trans-unit.target: Constant

trans-unit.source: The function cannot be deleted, and its properties cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 無法刪除函式，而且無法變更其屬性。

trans-unit.source: Constant is available only when you are creating a function.
trans-unit.target: 只有在您建立函式時才能使用 Constant。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the option of an existing function to Constant.
trans-unit.target: 您不能將現有函式的選項變更為 Constant。

trans-unit.source: Private
trans-unit.target: Private

trans-unit.source: The function is visible only in the current scope \(not in child scopes\).
trans-unit.target: 只能在目前範圍中函式會顯示 \(無法在子範圍\)。

trans-unit.source: ReadOnly
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly

trans-unit.source: The properties of the function cannot be changed except by using the Force parameter.
trans-unit.target: 除非使用 Force 參數，否則無法變更函式的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use [Remove\-Item [m2]](assetId:///f98b4219-60df-408b-bdc8-994f920fc7bd) to delete the function.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 [移除\-項目 #91; m2 ]](assetId:///f98b4219-60df-408b-bdc8-994f920fc7bd) 刪除函式。

trans-unit.source: AllScope
trans-unit.target: AllScope

trans-unit.source: The function is copied to any new scopes that are created.
trans-unit.target: 函式會複製到所建立的任何新範圍中。

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets supported:
trans-unit.target: 支援的 Cmdlet：

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.source: about\_Functions [m2]
about\_Providers
trans-unit.target: 關於\_提供者
